articles.author: Yara Nardi
articles.title: EU chief pledges migrant action plan in Italy's Lampedusa - Reuters
articles.description: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Sunday visited the Italian island of Lampedusa, which is struggling with a surge in migrant arrivals, and promised a 10-point EU action plan to help Italy deal with the situation.
